title: Revelation 4: "Things Which Must Be Hereafter"
content: begins John’s vision of events in the future—“things which must be hereafter” (v. 1). His account of this vision comprises the rest of the book of Revelation. Although it occasionally refers to events that occurred before John lived, the events were shown to better teach what will occur in the future.
